channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: Super League Rugby
channel.desc: Coverage from the Super League as St Helens take on Huddersfield.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Fake or Fortune?
channel.desc: An American couple think their $200 portrait could be a long-lost work by artist Angelica Kauffman. The evidence is promising, but its condition raises alarming questions.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Elizabeth Talbot and Philip Serrell discover a rare and intriguing picture by a troubled artist, and Paul visits the home of the British oyster industry and gets hands on with a conservation project that hopes to save this world-famous delicacy.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Italian Job
channel.desc: A group of petty criminals plan to rig a major traffic jam to divert attention from their bank heist.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Top Gear
channel.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are in Italy to take part in a series of tricky challenges and increasingly loud arguments as they attempt to find the world's best hot hatchback. Clarkson is in the Citroen DS3 Racing, Hammond championing the Fiat 500C Abarth and May making the case for the Renaultsport Clio Cup. Petrolhead comedian Ross Noble is the `Star in the Reasonably Priced Car'.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Murder Case
channel.desc: While embarking on a solo charity cycle ride from Fort William in the Scottish Highlands to his home in Tillicoultry, 63-year-old former navy officer Tony Parsons vanishes without a trace. This astonishing case unravels in ways no one could predict.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Silence of the Lambs
channel.desc: Multi-Oscar-winning thriller about a trainee female FBI agent who is seconded to the hunt for a horrific serial killer. For insight into the workings of his diseased mind she turns to the psychotic yet urbane Dr Hannibal `the Cannibal' Lecter, with whom she forms a compelling and dangerous relationship.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Commitments
channel.desc: Jimmy Rabbitte is a would-be music business wheeler and dealer, and he's decided what Dublin needs is a top-shelf soul band. However, top-shelf soul musicians are hard to find in Dublin, so he has to make do with what he can find. Before long, the band, called the Commitments, is packing them in at local clubs. Do they have what it takes to make the big time?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Destination X
channel.desc: The X-bus now makes its way to one of Europe's biggest wine making regions and the halfway point on this extraordinary journey, and host Rob Brydon still has plenty of tricks up his sleeve.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Here We Go
channel.desc: Robin goes LARPing, Paul becomes a mentor, Sue can't open a jar of gherkins, and Sam gets lost in the woods.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Policing Paradise
channel.desc: Police arrest a man for his role in the theft of an electric cycle. At sea, officers do a security patrol of the island's prison. And a constable is on a mission to evict a squatter.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Animal Park
channel.desc: The hippos arrive after a 700-mile journey, but will they take their first steps into their state-of-the-art home?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Antiques Roadshow
channel.desc: The roadshow visits the National Memorial Arboretum in Staffordshire for the 80th anniversary of VJ Day, featuring interviews with veterans and the stories of those who took part.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Match of the Day
channel.desc: The world's most famous football show, with the big names and the big games from the Premier League.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Impossible
channel.desc: Contestants compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Boss
channel.desc: Susan Calman hosts the quiz show where being in control is everything. Who will emerge as the Boss and walk away with the cash? Only the strongest players will survive the game.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Tournament
channel.desc: Eight contestants compete in a series of fast-paced quiz battles in an attempt to eliminate their opponents from the day's game and walk away with a cash prize.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great British Menu
channel.desc: The three chefs are halfway through their heat, and the pressure is mounting. Once again, they each serve their unique take on the brief celebrating British animation and illustration, inspired by Paddington's 65th birthday.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mexico: Earth's Festival of Life
channel.desc: Mexico is a vast country, over two thousand miles long, dominated by a great chain of mountains, the Sierra Madre. Journey down this rocky spine to discover an amazing diversity of life, from black bears and orchid bees to resplendent quetzals and millions of monarch butterflies. This is a land where giant volcanoes simmer and ancient and modern cultures collide in a festival of life.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Paul Martin presents from Grimsby Minster in north east Lincolnshire. Grimsby was a renowned fishing port, and antiques experts Christina Trevanion and Michael Baggott find great maritime memorabilia, including a ships bell and a diver's knife. Paul meets a Grimsby trawlerman on the vessel he took to sea.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, celebrity contestants Toby Anstis, Kerry Howard, Evelyn Mok and Joe Sugg take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, celebrity contestants Toby Anstis, Kerry Howard, Evelyn Mok and Joe Sugg take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Scams & Scandals
channel.desc: After all the commotion over Oasis tickets, reporter Steffan Powell delves into the murky world of ticket touts. He investigates why the odds are stacked against many of us securing tickets for high-profile events and exposes some of the people raking in thousands of pounds at our expense.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mastermind
channel.desc: The specialist subjects are the history of sheep, the Neapolitan novels of Elena Ferrante, the music of Katy Perry, and Gerrard Winstanley and the 17th-century protest movement, the Diggers.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Only Connect
channel.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz where knowledge only gets you so far. One team is medical, while the other is Mancunian. Both are tasked with establishing the connection between four apparently random clues.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: University Challenge
channel.desc: The first round of the 2025/26 competition continues with a Severnside derby as Cardiff University faces the University of Bristol. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Confessions of a Brain Surgeon
channel.desc: Top brain surgeon Henry Marsh is facing his own life-threatening diagnosis. He reveals the huge risks and emotional impact of a job filled with difficult life-and-death decisions.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Upstart Crow
channel.desc: Will's controversial new play is about to be presented to Queen Elizabeth when it goes missing. As the finger of suspicion points at his best friend Marlowe, can Will come up with a way to recover his stolen masterpiece? Given its politically sensitive content, is he really wise to want it back?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: OFF Air
channel.desc: This channel is off air, or it has temporarily no EPG data yet. We are working on a fix.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: OFF Air
channel.desc: This channel is off air, or it has temporarily no EPG data yet. We are working on a fix.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: OFF Air
channel.desc: This channel is off air, or it has temporarily no EPG data yet. We are working on a fix.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Destination X
channel.desc: For the first time, host Rob Brydon reveals to everyone on the X-bus where in the world they actually are. And the players' game plans are revealed - who has been keeping secrets from whom?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: MasterChef
channel.desc: The next group of home cooks are ready for a culinary battle in the second week of heats. The contestants will need to hit the ground running if they are to win an exclusive MasterChef apron.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Christina Trevanion meets former England rugby captain Gill Burns MBE, who fought tirelessly in the 1980s and 1990s to level the playing field for female players. Former players scour the stalls at Shepton Mallet antiques fair.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Money for Nothing
channel.desc: Chunky maple logs are sent to wood-turner Chris's workshop, but will transforming them leave him stumped?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Repair Shop: On the Road
channel.desc: Dom and Lucia help save an iconic Glasgow landmark, a Chinese unicorn is rescued, Will and Dom get to grips with a 5,000-year-old craft, and Will heads to Beauly to meet Alan MacPherson, who has gone from keen shinty player to shinty stick maker.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Impossible
channel.desc: Contestants compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Boss
channel.desc: Susan Calman hosts the quiz show where being in control is everything. Who will emerge as the Boss and walk away with the cash? Only the strongest players will survive the game.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Beechgrove Garden
channel.desc: The Beechgrove team marry sustainability with staying on-trend. Carole, Kirsty and Mairi are introduced to the plant craft of Kokedama by local house plant expert Fiona Macdonald. At her Edinburgh allotment, Kirsty demonstrates that people can still be on-trend and sustainable even if they are short of space, as she shows how to create a living-herb wall made from recycled materials.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: The Hundred
channel.desc: England captain Nat Sciver Brunt's Trent Rockets host Sophie Ecclestone's Manchester Originals at Trent Bridge. 2024's match between these two teams finished in a last-ball thriller, with the Originals winning by one run despite a brilliant 56 not out from Sciver-Brunt. Alex Hartley and Rick Edwards present, alongside Sir Alastair Cook, Steven Finn, Tash Farrant and Carlos Brathwaite.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: The Hundred
channel.desc: Manchester Originals travel to Trent Bridge to take on Trent Rockets. In this fixture last year, the Originals failed to score two runs off the last three balls to give the Rockets a superb victory. Originals batter Jos Buttler will come up against England teammate Joe Root, as well as international stars Marcus Stoinis and Lockie Ferguson. Alex Hartley and Rick Edwards present, alongside Sir Alastair Cook, Steven Finn, Tash Farrant and Carlos Brathwaite.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: QI XL
channel.desc: Sandi Toksvig goes rogue with Bill Bailey, Jack Carroll, Olga Koch and Alan Davies.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Martin Fishback
channel.desc: Following tactless middle-class dad Martin Fishback as he decides to become a successful novelist, having being made redundant after 25 years in the toothpaste industry. Put on the spot by an incompetent police officer, Martin settles on writing a detective crime thriller and heads into his home town of Exeter, aka the crime capital of east Devon, for inspiration.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saving Lives at Sea
channel.desc: With Storm Eunice - and its 100 mph winds - battering the south coast, the Portsmouth crew have to decide whether they can even launch to a wind surfer in trouble. It's reported that the casualty doesn't have his diabetes medication with him.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: VJ Day 80: We Were There
channel.desc: To mark the 80th anniversary of VJ Day, Rachel Burden speaks to the last veterans about their memories of the brutal war against Japan and the final months of the Second World War.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
channel.desc: It's Reduce, Reuse, Recycle week, with sewers creating a zero-waste jacket, transforming discarded tents and raiding wardrobes to Make Do and Mend for new outfits.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: MasterChef
channel.desc: This week's second heat welcomes new hopefuls to take on the cooking competition. The contenders will need to jump straight into action as they cook off for one of the MasterChef aprons.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: MasterChef
channel.desc: The inimitable Grace Dent makes a gracious return to set the brief. Inspired by memories of picnics in the Lake District with her mum, she wants the quarter-finalists to create the perfect picnic, which must include two savoury items and one sweet.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: The presenters take the prospective buyers around to different houses in the country. The desire for more room, cleaner air and less noise drives city dwellers to seek an escape to the country.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Bidding Room
channel.desc: Robert's impressive concrete bust takes Suzie's breath away, Carl hopes to lock in a sale for his antique handcuffs, and will two mannequin heads be better than one as Tracey faces the dealers?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
channel.desc: Actors Julie Graham and Tamzin Outhwaite are touring Sussex in a 1980s Citroen Dyane. Tamzin is best known for her roles in `EastEnders' and `Red Cap', while Julie is a well-known face from `Benidorm', `Doctor Who', and `Shetland'.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Impossible
channel.desc: Contestants compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Boss
channel.desc: Susan Calman hosts the quiz show where being in control is everything. Who will emerge as the Boss and walk away with the cash? Only the strongest players will survive the game.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Tournament
channel.desc: Eight contestants compete in a series of fast-paced quiz battles in an attempt to eliminate their opponents from the day's game and walk away with a cash prize.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great British Menu
channel.desc: The two highest-scoring chefs from Northern Ireland must go head-to-head and cook their six-course menus again. They need to impress Michelin-starred chef Marcus Wareing, chef and restaurateur Nisha Katona, and comedian and food podcaster Ed Gamble.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mexico: Earth's Festival of Life
channel.desc: The ancient temples of the Maya still tower over the forests of the Yucatan, where jaguars, monkeys and vibrant tropical birds now make their home. It is a forest full of secrets, with a vast watery underworld that is still being explored and which holds the key to how animals and people survive the dry season.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: The team are at Grimsby Minster in north east Lincolnshire. Antiques experts Christina Trevanion and Anita Manning find treasures among the hundreds of visitors to take to auction. Anita is entranced by some pigeon racing memorabilia and Christina uncovers a rare Chinese silver butter bowl.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, celebrity contestants Toby Anstis, Kerry Howard, Evelyn Mok and Joe Sugg take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Rick Stein's Food Stories
channel.desc: Rick delves into Glasgow's multicultural food scene, tucking into Korean and Pakistani dishes and finding out how Italian food became part of the city's fabric. Plus, he discovers the best chocolate he's ever tasted.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: WA Diamond League Athletics
channel.desc: Great Britain's Olympic star Keely Hodgkinson runs for the first time since winning gold in Paris last summer as the Diamond League heads to Lausanne. She lines up against training partner Georgia Hunter Bell in the Women's 800m, with the World Championships in Tokyo less than a month away.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Sacred Rivers with Simon Reeve
channel.desc: Simon follows the sacred waters of the Ganges from source to sea. Along the way he meets westerners in Rishikesh seeking spiritual enlightenment, takes a holy dip in the waters at Haridwar and discovers how the river is being polluted in Kanpur.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
channel.desc: Paul and Bob are in the Lake District to fish at some of the UK's best loved beauty spots, Derwentwater and Watendlath Tarn. In a change from the norm, this time Bob has chosen where they go fishing in a poignant trip down memory lane for him.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Tamara Drewe
channel.desc: Tamara Drewe returns to the sleepy Dorset village where she grew up to sell her mother's house. Once the big-nosed girl next door, she has had a nose job and is a successful journalist in London. Her old flame Andy is still working for philandering novelist Nicholas Hardiment and his long-suffering wife and, when Tamara begins a relationship with rock drummer Ben Sergeant, there begins a three-way contest for her affections.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Uncanny
channel.desc: In the final case of the series, Danny is joined in the studio by Angela and her daughter Emily. They tell him about events that happened to them in the early 2000s when Emily was a child. A seemingly supernatural presence that began as what Angela thought was an imaginary friend, soon grew into something far more terrifying. Both Emily and her sister became too scared to sleep in their rooms, supposedly beset by the malign presence of an old man who threatened Emily and her family.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: VJ Day 80: We Were There
channel.desc: To mark the 80th anniversary of VJ Day, Rachel Burden speaks to the last veterans about their memories of the brutal war against Japan and the final months of the Second World War.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Moors Murders: A Search for Justice
channel.desc: The Moors murderers, Ian Brady and Myra Hindley, were sentenced to life imprisonment in 1966 for killing three children. But now a team has examined past investigations, rediscovered files and delved into Ian Brady's archive.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: It's back to school for Martin in Tunbridge Wells. Dion is in Merseyside, where the term `back to brick' couldn't be more appropriate. Jacqui has a lot of stairs to climb in Kent.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Bidding Room
channel.desc: A mother and daughter drive the dealers nuts to secure a sale, the bidders enjoy a seventies classic, and toy collector Russell returns with a game that's going nowhere fast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Gardeners' World
channel.desc: Monty is cutting back in the Cottage Garden to make room for annuals, harvesting tomatoes and taking sage cuttings in the Herb Garden. Joe Swift visits a historic allotment site in Nottingham which has been brought back to life.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Impossible
channel.desc: Contestants compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

channel.title: The Boss
channel.desc: Susan Calman hosts the quiz show where being in control is everything. Who will emerge as the Boss and walk away with the cash? Only the strongest players will survive the game.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Tournament
channel.desc: Eight contestants compete in a series of fast-paced quiz battles in an attempt to eliminate their opponents from the day's game and walk away with a cash prize.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great British Menu
channel.desc: The final heats, for central England, begin. Returning to the programme after a four-year break is Marianne Lumb, now a private chef for exclusive clients.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mexico: Earth's Festival of Life
channel.desc: Northern Mexico is the country's driest region, dominated by two great deserts, the Sonoran and Chihuahuan. Further west, the conditions get hotter, drier and more challenging. This is a look at the forces that have created this arid world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Paul Martin revisits some of the locations visited by the show and presents all-new valuations. Experts touch down at Bletchley Park, the Ulster Transport Museum and Crowcombe Court to track down some unusual items to sell at auction. They uncover a beautiful watercolour and some stunning porcelain, and Paul Martin visits Antony in Cornwall to unearth a fascinating family history.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, celebrity contestants Toby Anstis, Kerry Howard, Evelyn Mok and Joe Sugg take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Rick Stein's Food Stories
channel.desc: In Yorkshire, Rick discovers the history behind the Yorkshire pudding and how best to make this most famous of British foods. After Indian-style mushy peas in Leeds, he enjoys a pint of his favourite bitter and reminisces about a literary hero.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: SOS: Extreme Rescues
channel.desc: An injured climber is hanging by ropes after a 20m fall, mountain rescue solve the sad mystery of a missing man, coastguards are called to a dog walker with a dislocated ankle.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Grand Tours of Scotland's Rivers
channel.desc: This surprising grand tour follows the river Ythan in rural Aberdeenshire, which flows through a landscape of wheat fields and haunted castles and on to a coast rich in wildlife. On the way, Paul Murton learns how to make a haystack, speak the local 'Doric' and has a ghostly encounter with a woman in Fyvie Castle. He visits Gight Castle, the ruined home of the poet Lord Byron's family. Journey's end is at the mouth of the river where sand dunes have created Scotland's version of the Sahara.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saving Lives at Sea
channel.desc: The Newhaven crew make a desperate attempt to convince a solo yachtsman that he needs rescuing. When his anchor line snaps, he is at the mercy of the rolling swells and the storm force winds, and his vessel is smashed up on the breakwater.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Lucy Worsley Investigates
channel.desc: Lucy Worsley investigates how George's mental illness changed Britain. She uncovers Royal papers and explores how the attempt on his life by a mentally ill subject changed psychiatry forever.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live at the Apollo
channel.desc: The inimitable Stephen Bailey welcomes comedians Lara Ricote and Glenn Moore to the stage.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Confessions of a Brain Surgeon
channel.desc: Top brain surgeon Henry Marsh is facing his own life-threatening diagnosis. He reveals the huge risks and emotional impact of a job filled with difficult life-and-death decisions.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Fake or Fortune?
channel.desc: An American couple think their $200 portrait could be a long-lost work by artist Angelica Kauffman. The evidence is promising, but its condition raises alarming questions.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saving Lives at Sea
channel.desc: With Storm Eunice - and its 100 mph winds - battering the south coast, the Portsmouth crew have to decide whether they can even launch to a wind surfer in trouble. It's reported that the casualty doesn't have his diabetes medication with him.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Chess Masters: The Endgame
channel.desc: In the second heat, six new players face a gruelling game of speed chess and a puzzle called `the raging rook', which allows the players to showcase their mastery of one of the most powerful pieces.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Moors Murders: A Search for Justice
channel.desc: An analysis of the Moors murders case reveals evidence which could close it, following investigators as they transform the understanding of these crimes.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: We're 'flat out' in this episode, with three very different flats in London, Bath and Shropshire. Will the new owners who purchased them at auction be able to bring them up to scratch?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Bidding Room
channel.desc: Elaine is first through the doors, making friends wherever she goes. Will her miniature perfume bottles bring the sweet smell of success? Daniel tries to shift a pair of furry bedside tables, and Pixie shows off her parachute silk wedding dress.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Anna Haugh's Big Irish Food Tour
channel.desc: In Galway, Anna joins rugby legend Bundee Aki who needs help with his cooking skills. Anna meets a farmer producing organic beef, the two go to work on a high-welfare egg farm.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
channel.desc: In Zurich, Michael Portillo has a brush with the absurd in the anarchic paintings and artistic haunts of the Dadaists, a group of artists who found refuge in the city during the First World War. He visits the impressive Grossmunster Church to find out about the rebellious pastor at the centre of the Swiss Reformation and studies the 500-year-old Froschauer Bible, the earliest German-language bible in the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great British Menu
channel.desc: The three chefs are halfway through their heat, and the pressure is mounting. Once again, they each serve their unique take on the brief celebrating British animation and illustration, inspired by Paddington's 65th birthday.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great British Menu
channel.desc: The two highest-scoring chefs from central England must go head-to-head and cook their menus again. The guest judge, actress Duaa Karim, helps decide the winner for central England. There are dishes celebrating the Dandy and video game Pac-Man.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Paul Martin presents from Chiddingstone Castle in Kent. He visits Anne Boleyn's family home, Hever Castle, and reveals what influenced her rise to power. Antiques experts Claire Rawle and Adam Partridge unearth unique antiques and collectibles that reflect the local Kent character.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, celebrity contestants Toby Anstis, Kerry Howard, Evelyn Mok and Joe Sugg take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Rick Stein's Food Stories
channel.desc: Food writer Gurdeep Loyal gives Rick a tour of Leicester's finest Indian food, from a hidden gem food truck to the Indian equivalent of high tea at the Ritz. Plus, Rick cooks chicken tikka masala and matar kulcha.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Villages by the Sea
channel.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson uncovers how the health and fortune of the village was shaped by those in charge of Bamburgh's famous castle.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Beechgrove Garden
channel.desc: A lot of the action is in the greenhouse as Kirsty and Brian will be taste-testing the chillies that they first featured at the start of May.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Gardeners' World
channel.desc: With a bank holiday weekend to look forward to, Adam Frost has a few things to be getting on with in the garden. His mini-meadow needs some attention, he's got an autumn container to plant up, and in the borders, there are seeds to collect.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Miriam Margolyes Discovers New Zealand
channel.desc: Miriam Margolyes embarks on a road trip around New Zealand's North Island, discovering a country with a unique heritage. She also finds herself at her first ever rugby match - a game she has always thought she loathed.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mammoth
channel.desc: Reeling from some recent news that drops a bombshell on his life, Tony Mammoth tries to make up for lost time. But despite his best efforts, things don't go to plan, and he and Theo end up in a fight with a stranger.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Prestige
channel.desc: Period thriller set in Edwardian London where two rival magicians, partners until the tragic death of an assistant during a show, feud bitterly after one of them performs the ultimate magic trick - teleportation. His rival tries desperately to uncover the secret of his routine, experimenting with dangerous new science as his quest takes him to the brink of insanity and jeopardises the lives of everyone around the pair.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Moment of Proof
channel.desc: Police are left confounded by a serial burglar's Houdini-style disappearing act. But a single piece of information brings the game of hide-and-seek to a sudden end.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great British Railway Journeys
channel.desc: Michael Portillo re-enacts the Battle of Shrewsbury and explores the town's beautiful gothic cathedral, while also riding the Telford Steam Railway's flagship locomotive.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Human
channel.desc: During the height of the Ice Age, one of the coldest times humanity has ever known, Homo sapiens steps into the last habitable continents on the planet: the Americas.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: It's a very windy day and the Squirrels want to play outside. Duggee knows what to do, he's flying his kite. The Squirrels make their own kites to fly.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Preston's forgotten egg sandwich has developed an explosive odour, fouling the entire town. Mojo and Bo must evacuate Swoppiton before the eggy `stinkplosion' overwhelms everyone.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Twinkle uses her excellent pocket beast card skills when on a quest to rescue the missing Council of Happiness from Grackle the Giant.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings activate the air conditioner's AI, causing it to fall in love with the fridge.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy finds a polar bear and realises they are from the same species.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons: The Series
channel.desc: The Rising Volt Tacklers come to the Land of Kitakami to meet with Terapagos researcher Briar, and decide to participate in a festival being held there, but when Roy and Crocalor accidentally touch a machine set up, they end up switching bodies.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Adam and Joe become busy bees for a gunge-fuelled challenge where they must each fight to collect the most nectar and win Callum's ultimate respect.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Pete tries to juggle regionals and the Brawl, while Ethan and Olive become suspicious.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A-Troupe struggle under the weight of all the secrets they have kept from each other.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
channel.desc: The sewers tackle a pattern for children's dungarees, re-purpose maternity wear into toddler outfits, giving new life to old garments, and design outfits inspired by their childhood dream jobs.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Train
channel.desc: A true story of wartime heroism about a French railway inspector who goes up against the Nazis in order to prevent a trainload of France's most treasured paintings from being stolen.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Beechgrove Garden
channel.desc: Calum Clunie has been growing for the Fife veg and flower shows since he was 15 years old, and now he has an allotment in Leven that has dedicated to growing the largest leeks and most dazzling dahlias.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Final Score
channel.desc: A panel of experts run through the afternoon's football results.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Presenter Paul Martin and experts Thomas Plant and Catherine Southon are at London Zoo on the prowl for antiques and collectibles to sell at auction. Collectibles rub shoulders with antiques, and as ever, there are a few surprises in the saleroom. Paul visits London's temple to all things aesthetic, the Victoria and Albert Museum, to discover its fascinating history and explore the new Architecture Gallery.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: The Hundred
channel.desc: Coverage of The Hundred 100-ball cricket tournament.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: We Want the Funk!
channel.desc: A comprehensive voyage through the roots and history of funk music, from its African and jazz roots to James Brown's early work and the rise of Parliament-Funkadelic.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Electric Proms
channel.desc: From the Roundhouse in Camden, as part of the Electric Proms, James Brown performs a selection of his greatest songs with his 24-piece band plus the London Community Gospel Choir.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Shaft
channel.desc: A supercool detective investigating a kidnapping becomes embroiled in a war between the white mafia and the black mob.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Luzzu
channel.desc: A poor Maltese fisherman faces temptation to sell his wooden fishing boat and join a black-market operation that's decimating the Mediterranean fish population and the livelihoods of local families.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Parenthood
channel.desc: Parents must constantly balance risk and reward when raising young in open grasslands. Whilst abundant grass promises plentiful food and places to call home, this alone cannot guarantee success.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The A to Z of TV Gardening
channel.desc: Carol Kirkwood explores gardening subjects which begin with the letter A.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Breakfast
channel.desc: The BBC's Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Beechgrove Garden
channel.desc: A lot of the action is in the greenhouse as Kirsty and Brian will be taste-testing the chillies that they first featured at the start of May.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Weatherman Walking
channel.desc: The final episode in the series and Derek Brockway, the Weatherman, walks along a stunning and often overlooked stretch of coastline dominated by the Second Severn Crossing or Prince of Wales Bridge. On his journey he rings an ancient church bell, finds a water scorpion which breathes through its bottom, and learns about the `Rogiet Hoard' and discovers how the village of Sudbrook evolved. He also wades into the River Severn in the footsteps of ancient fisherman and finishes in Chepstow.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
channel.desc: More mouthwatering recipes from Poppy O'Toole, Paul Ainsworth, Tony Singh and Marianne Lumb. Meanwhile, Rick Stein and the Hairy Bikers head out and about across the UK.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
channel.desc: Nigel transforms favourite classic recipes by giving them a new twist. Whether it's a makeover for the traditional cottage pie, or an exciting new version of the time-honoured apple tart, he proves that it's easy to jazz up our favourite dishes.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: Women's Rugby World Cup
channel.desc: Ireland face Japan in the group stage of the Women's Rugby World Cup 2025.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Chariots of Fire
channel.desc: Social pressure and personal turmoil beset two British athletes on their way to glory in the 1924 Olympics.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Fake or Fortune?
channel.desc: The team return to two portraits of Black British women from the 18th and 19th centuries. How have recent changes in society transformed the fortunes of these important artworks?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Paul Martin and experts Mark Stacey, Anita Manning and David Fletcher are at Tatton Park in Cheshire.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Proms
channel.desc: Every unmissable concert from the world's greatest classical music festival.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Top Gear
channel.desc: The `Top Gear' boys welcome in the New Year with a special selection of films and guests from the vaults celebrating the best of British. Even James Bond would be jealous of the selection of British cars put through their paces by Jeremy, Richard and James, ranging from the frightening fast Aston Martin V8 Vantage, Noble M15, and Lotus Exige, to the ludicrous luxury of the Rolls Royce Phantom.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Murder Case
channel.desc: With unprecedented access to the police investigation and criminal trial, the shocking truth of what really happened on the night Tony Parsons disappeared is discovered.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Godfather
channel.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business.
